## Import data

```{r}
library(here)
library(skimr)
```

Let's import the aggregrated data frame that contains species richness and community biomass per habitat across nine sites and two management regimes.

```{r}
bm <- read_csv(here("data/final", "biomass_tidy.csv"))
```

```{r}
skimr::skim(bm)
```

## Guo's invasibility index

Here's the math behind the unified measure of invasibility [@guo2015]

$I_{e} = 1 - (h * \frac{S_{obs}}{S_{max}} + (1-h)*\frac{B_{obs}}{B_{max}})$
